viewData.name: Microsoft 13.5" Multi-Touch Surface Laptop 2 (Cobalt Blue)
viewData.short_description: Buy Microsoft 13.5" Multi-Touch Surface Laptop 2 (Cobalt Blue) featuring 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5-8250U Quad-Core, 8GB of LPPR3 RAM | 256GB SSD 13.5" 2256 x 1504 PixelSense Touchscreen. Review Microsoft Laptop 2
viewData.long_description: Featuring a premium look and feel, the cobalt blue Microsoft 13.5" Surface Laptop 2 is a compact and portable system that's designed for all-day performance.
